Scrimgeour, Robert Shedden & John Shedden Scrimgeour & Co.

note.p: Stockbrokers. In London at 22 Threadneedle Street. Robert Shedden Scrimgeour (1788–1863) and John Shedden Scrimgeour (1796–1868) were the sons of James Scrimgeour and his wife Janet Shedden.
